narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Estefania Rivera is a Speech-Language Pathologist,   provider based in Edinburg, TX. From 2023-02 through 2024-12, this provider received $401K in Medicaid payments across 5K claims serving 1K beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 1.6× the national median for 92507 (92507), at $77 per claim vs. the median of $49, placing them above the 75th percentile.
99% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 92507 (92507). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Spending more than doubled from $91K in 2023 to $310K in 2024 (240% growth).
Saw a 3.4× spike in 2024 ($91K → $310K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
